meanings.sent1: I have many orgs in my body that work together to keep me healthy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied different orgs under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The orgs in the forest had a meeting to discuss the upcoming changes in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent4: The orgs of the city functioned like a well-oiled machine, each contributing to the overall efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The orgs of the body are like a symphony, each playing its part to create harmony.

meanings.sent1: Many orgs in the city work together to support the community.
meanings.sent2: She joined various orgs to volunteer and make a difference.
meanings.sent3: The orgs decided to have a potluck to celebrate their successful projects.
meanings.sent4: The orgs in the business world compete fiercely for market dominance.
meanings.sent5: Joining different orgs can help you expand your network and skills.
